#summary Easy Setup Reins of the Grey Riding Camel

= Easy Setup Grey Riding Camel =

  # [Installation Install] and Enable the Plugin in your HB
  # Open the [DescriptionConfigWindow Configwindow]. 
  # Check "Collect Figurines" on Tap One
  # If you think your CC can handle the Fight against Dormus also check "Kill Dormus" on Tap One. (Alternatively don't let your Bot alone so you can hear the Alert)
  # Take a look at the Security Settings on Tap Three and then press Save.
  # Download the Profile for Camel Figurine --> [http://pluginrarekiller.googlecode.com/svn/profile/ Link Here]
  # Place your toon somewhere to Uldum
  # Choose Gatherbuddy2, load the Profile and press start.
